description: Resin banana mod for King Kong pinball machines. Available in classic yellow or luminous glow-in-the-dark variants. Easy installation, durable resin construction. Perfect for jungle and King Kong-themed machines.
title: Banana

description: Handpainted barrel with banana on top for King Kong and jungle-themed pinball machines. Durable resin and PLA plastic construction. Easy installation, no tools required. Compatible with Jurassic Park, Congo, and more.
title: Barrel with Banana

description: Set of 5 printed palm trees for pinball machines. Multiple mounting options for tropical-themed machine customization. Compatible with jungle-themed pinball games like Castaway, Gilligan's Island, White Water, and Jurassic Park.
title: Set of palm trees

description: 3D-printed King Kong gong replacement for King Kong Pro pinball machines. Premium PLA plastic with perfect fit and easy installation. Custom painted details included.
title: King Kong Gong Replacement (Pro Model)

description: Handcrafted 64x128 pixel dot matrix display with artisanal wooden housing. Retro arcade charm meets modern LED technology. Features marquee mode, clock, VU meter, Game of Life. Web-interface control and firmware updates.
title: Dot Matrix Display 64x128 - Handmade Wood Edition

description: Premium CNC-machined 64x128 pixel dot matrix display with industrial-grade precision housing. Professional-quality arcade and pinball display. Features marquee, clock, VU meter, Game of Life. API support and firmware updates included.
title: Dot Matrix Display 64x128 - Industrial CNC Edition

description: Pulp Fiction topper with sound-reactive LED frame featuring Mia and Vincent dancing at Jack Rabbit Slim's. Hand-painted glass artwork with dynamic lighting for pinball machines.
title: Pulp Fiction Topper - Jack Rabbit Slim's Dance

title: Red black free text
